content: Douglas T. Kenrick Ph.D. on January 1, 2026 in Sex, Murder, and the Meaning of Life There are at least seven good reasons that birdwatching is good for your physical and psychological health. There are at least seven good reasons that birdwatching is good for your physical and psychological health. Anna Katharina Schaffner Ph.D. on January 1, 2026 in The Art of Self-Improvement The most powerful story you will ever tell is the one you tell about yourself. It shapes your identity, your motivation, your happiness—and your future. The most powerful story you will ever tell is the one you tell about yourself. It shapes your identity, your motivation, your happiness—and your future. Pia Owens on December 31, 2025 in Getting Comfortable with Conflict Recognize the signs of “self-gaslighting”—when you internalize the dismissive voices you’ve heard from others—and learn to take your own needs and emotions seriously. Recognize the signs of “self-gaslighting”—when you internalize the dismissive voices you’ve heard from others—and learn to take your own needs and emotions seriously. Wendy L. Learn about dopamine, genetics, and brain function, and how dopamine signalling differences shape ADHD experience. Why do some brains crave more stimulation than others? You can express your truth in ways that care for and protect you. Joachim I. Krueger Ph.D. on January 1, 2026 in One Among Many Becoming a fully functioning adult is a challenge. As more young people stumble, society wants answers. Tough love is one of the options that should be on the menu. Becoming a fully functioning adult is a challenge. As more young people s...
summary: Konten ini membahas berbagai aspek psikologi yang memengaruhi kesehatan mental dan kebahagiaan. Menurut Douglas T. Kenrick, memantau burung (birdwatching) memberikan manfaat fisik dan psikologis, seperti mengurangi stres dan meningkatkan konsentrasi. Anna Katharina Schaffner menekankan bahwa cerita tentang diri sendiri menjadi kunci dalam membentuk identitas, motivasi, dan kebahagiaan. Pia Owens menyajikan konsep "self-gaslighting", yaitu ketika seseorang menginternalisasi kata-kata menyeret dari orang lain, sehingga mengabaikan kebutuhan dan perasaan dirinya sendiri. Wendy L. Patrick menjelaskan bahwa ketika pasangan menunjukkan perhatian ekstrem terhadap satu pihak, hal ini bisa memicu kesan saling mencintai, meski tidak selalu benar. Julie Radico menyarankan untuk memahami nilai kepercayaan dalam hubungan melalui model "onion relationship", yaitu menilai tempat teman dalam lapisan hubungan. Louis Putterman membahas konsep "Romance of Reality", yang menjelaskan bagaimana kesadaran dan kehidupan dapat tumbuh meskipun terdapat ketidaksesuaian antara kompleksitas dan entropi. Artikel ini menekankan pentingnya memahami diri sendiri, menghargai hubungan, dan mengenali peran emosi dan kepercayaan dalam kehidupan sehari-hari. Dengan memperhatikan hal-hal ini, seseorang dapat membangun kebahagiaan, kesehatan mental, dan kepercayaan diri. Artikel ini juga menawarkan saran praktis untuk mencari terapis jika diperlukan.
